pr_title: SO-3965: Add lock context to non-SNOMEDCT import requests

timeline.message: SO-3965: Add lock context to non-SNOMEDCT import requests

timeline.bodyText: Make this parent lock context configurable please.
timeline.author: cmark

timeline.bodyText: ⚠️ In case of BranchContext, this works fine, but in other cases the branch argument is missing from the Locks object, which might result in an exception runtime.
timeline.author: cmark

timeline.message: SO-3965: Make parent lock context configurable
SO-3965: Make import parent lock context configurable
SO-3965: Let import lock context wrap subsequent lock operations

timeline.bodyText:
This is not the parentLockContext() but the lockContext itself, please rename.
Also, please rename the class to LockRequest.
timeline.author: cmark

timeline.message: SO-3965: Convert import request to generic lock request
SO-3965: Change visibility of LockRequest constructors
